attributes.action: To put a stop to COVID passports being required for night clubs
attributes.additional_details: Because it’s discrimination & is taking away basic human rights. It should be down to personal choice as to whether an individual has it or not. Instead, many are having it unwillingly just so they can go on holiday for example or go to a nightclub. It’s going to create social segregation
attributes.background: I want the Government to stop bullying the public to have a COVID ‘vaccination’

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/592671
